Module Utilities
Package utility

Class Value

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Number
utility.Value
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Value extends Number
A utility class for manipulating and mutating a numeric value.
Since:
1.0
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructs a new Value object using a number to provide an initial value.
